Uses of Class
org.nodex.java.core.http.HttpClient

  • Packages that use HttpClient 
    Package Description
    org.nodex.java.core.http  

    • Uses of HttpClient in org.nodex.java.core.http

      Methods in org.nodex.java.core.http that return HttpClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpClient HttpClient.setHost(java.lang.String host)
      Set the host that the client will attempt to connect to, to host.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setKeepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
      If keepAlive is true then, after the request has ended the connection will be returned to the pool where it can be used by another request.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setKeyStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL key store.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setKeyStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL key store.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setMaxPoolSize(int maxConnections)
      Set the maximum pool size to the value specified by maxConnections
      HttpClient HttpClient.setPort(int port)
      Set the port that the client will attempt to connect to on the server to port.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setReceiveBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP receive buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setReuseAddress(boolean reuse)
      Set the TCP reuseAddress setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setSendBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP send buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setSoLinger(boolean linger)
      Set the TCP soLinger setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setSSL(boolean ssl)
      If ssl is true, this signifies that any connections will be SSL connections.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTCPKeepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
      Set the TCP keepAlive setting for connections created by this instance to keepAlive.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
      If tcpNoDelay is set to true then Nagle's algorithm will turned off for the TCP connections created by this instance.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTrafficClass(int trafficClass)
      Set the TCP trafficClass setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTrustAll(boolean trustAll)
      If trustAll is set to true then the client will trust ALL server certifactes and will not attempt to authenticate them against it's local client trust store.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTrustStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL trust store.
      HttpClient HttpClient.setTrustStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL trust store.
